text: Gonzalo Anes Álvarez de Castrillón (10 December 1931 - 31 March 2014) was a Spanish economist, professor and historian. He was the Marquis of Castrillon from 2010 until his death in 2014. He was also a director of the Royal Academy of History. He was born in Trelles, Coaña, Asturias. Anes died on 31 March 2014 in Madrid. He was 82 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Gonzalo Anes at the Royal Academy of History Category:1931 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Spanish economists Category:Spanish academics Category:Spanish historians Category:People from Asturias
title: Gonzalo Anes
